verses.verse: So the <S%H4428>king<s%> and <S%H2001>Haman<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H8354>banquet<s%> with <S%H635>Esther<s%> the <S%H4436>queen.<s%>

The <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> again to <S%H635>Esther<s%> on the <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> at the <S%H4960>banquet<s%> of <S%H3196>wine,<s%> "What is your <S%H7596>petition,<s%> <S%H4436>queen<s%> <S%H635>Esther?<s%> It shall be <S%H5414>granted<s%> <S%H1246>you.<s%> What is your request? Even to the <S%H2677>half<s%> of the <S%H4438>kingdom<s%> it shall be <S%H6213>performed.<s%>"

Then <S%H635>Esther<s%> the <S%H4436>queen<s%> <S%H6030>answered,<s%> <S%H559>"If<s%> I have <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H2580>favor<s%> in your <S%H5869>sight,<s%> O <S%H4428>king,<s%> and if it <S%H2895>please<s%> the <S%H4428>king,<s%> let my <S%H5315>life<s%> be <S%H5414>given<s%> me at my <S%H7596>petition,<s%> and my <S%H5971>people<s%> at my <S%H1246>request.<s%>

For we are <S%H4376>sold,<s%> I and my <S%H5971>people,<s%> to be <S%H8045>destroyed,<s%> to be <S%H2026>slain,<s%> and to <S%H6>perish.<s%> But <S%H432>if<s%> we had been <S%H4376>sold<s%> for <S%H5650>bondservants<s%> and <S%H8198>bondmaids,<s%> I would have held my <S%H2790>peace,<s%> although the <S%H6862>adversary<s%> could not have <S%H7737>compensated<s%> for the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H5143>loss.<s%>"

Then <S%H4428>King<s%> <S%H325>Ahasuerus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H635>Esther<s%> the <S%H4436>queen,<s%> "Who is <S%H4390>he,<s%> and where is he who dared presume in his <S%H3820>heart<s%> to do <S%H6213>so?<s%>"

<S%H635>Esther<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "An <S%H376>adversary<s%> and an <S%H341>enemy,<s%> even this <S%H7451>wicked<s%> <S%H2001>Haman!<s%>" Then <S%H2001>Haman<s%> was <S%H1204>afraid<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> and the <S%H4436>queen.<s%>

The <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H6965>arose<s%> in his <S%H2534>wrath<s%> from the <S%H4960>banquet<s%> of <S%H3196>wine<s%> and went into the <S%H1055>palace<s%> <S%H1594>garden.<s%> <S%H2001>Haman<s%> stood <S%H5975>up<s%> to make <S%H1245>request<s%> for his <S%H5315>life<s%> to <S%H635>Esther<s%> the <S%H4436>queen;<s%> for he <S%H7200>saw<s%> that there was <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H3615>determined<s%> against him by the <S%H4428>king.<s%>

Then the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H7725>returned<s%> out of the <S%H1055>palace<s%> <S%H1594>garden<s%> into the <S%H1004>place<s%> of the <S%H4960>banquet<s%> of <S%H3196>wine;<s%> and <S%H2001>Haman<s%> had <S%H5307>fallen<s%> on the <S%H4296>couch<s%> where <S%H635>Esther<s%> <S%H4428>was.<s%> Then the king <S%H559>said,<s%> "Will he even <S%H3533>assault<s%> the <S%H4436>queen<s%> in front of me in the <S%H1004>house?<s%>" As the <S%H1697>word<s%> went <S%H3318>out<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> they <S%H2645>covered<s%> <S%H2001>Haman<s%>'s <S%H6440>face.<s%>

Then <S%H2726>Harbonah,<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> of the <S%H5631>eunuchs<s%> who were <S%H6440>with<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H6086>"Behold,<s%> the gallows <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> <S%H1364>high,<s%> which <S%H2001>Haman<s%> has <S%H6213>made<s%> for <S%H4782>Mordecai,<s%> who <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H2896>good<s%> for the <S%H4428>king,<s%> is <S%H5975>standing<s%> at <S%H2001>Haman<s%>'s <S%H1004>house.<s%>" The <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "Hang him on <S%H8518>it!<s%>"

So they <S%H8518>hanged<s%> <S%H2001>Haman<s%> on the <S%H6086>gallows<s%> that he had <S%H3559>prepared<s%> for <S%H4782>Mordecai.<s%> Then was the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H2534>wrath<s%> <S%H7918>pacified.<s%>
